RTS/CTS flow control on
Baud rate 115200
Data bits=8, Stop bits=1, Parity=None


serialnum = 0x057e3f00 (4161029)
level = 0xcc (0x00-0xff)
checksum = 0E F2 (checksum algorithm CRC-CCITT (Kermit) 16bit)
seq = 11 (seems to be going from 10 to 1f and then wrap back to 10)

Set Dim level command
TX: 5A + length +  1B 5A 00 15 + seq + 82 07 00 80 00 00 00 00 + serialnum + 01 00 + level + checksum + A5



sniffed packets:

dim 80%

TX: 5A191B5A0015118207008000000000057E3F000100CC0EF2A5
RX: 5A1A030100122EA03F00057E3F0000800000007A025F0807FEA5

TX: 5A191B5A0015128207008000000000057E3F000100CC2F68A5
RX: 5A1A030100122FA03F00057E3F000080000000D707DE9107FEA5

TX: 5A191B5A0015138207008000000000057E3F000100CC3FE6A5
RX: 5A1A0301001220A03F00057E3F000080000000FC3261EB07FEA5

TX: 5A191B5A0015148207008000000000057E3F000100CC7C54A5
RX: 5A1A0301001221A03F00057E3F0000800000005137385E07FEA5

TX: 5A171B510013138207008000000000057E3F0000B5E7A5
TX: 5A171B510013158207008000000000057E3F0000D8E9A5


Other zone: switch ON
TX: 5A171B500013168207008000000000BC7D3F0000C450A5
TX: 5A171B500013178207008000000000BC7D3F00002E2EA5
TX: 5A171B5000131A8207008000000000BC7D3F00001E4CA5

After some time has passed,
the dongle will answer 5a06020a00a5 on all dim commands, (dim commands do work, but not if the are too closely written in time)
maybe it needs some re-init
